title: Thursday’s best deals: 11-inch refurb iPad Pro $589 off, official iPhone 13 cases from $26, more
content:
All of Thursday’s best deals are now up for the taking, with a $589 refurbished Apple 11-inch iPad Pro discount leading the way. That’s alongside Apple’s official Silicone iPhone 13 MagSafe case at $26 and VOCOlinc’s HomeKit air purifier. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Thursday’s best deals: 11-inch refurb iPad Pro $589 off, official iPhone 13 cases from $26, more appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Thanks to a refurb Woot sale, the Apple 11-inch iPad Pro is now up to $589 off alongside official iPhone 13 cases and more.
